author: Al Jazeera
title: Russian ex-official: Putin’s plan is full victory on March 2
description: Former Russian deputy FM Fedorov says the first days of March are important in the Russian-Ukrainian war.
content: Andrei Fedorov, former deputy Russian foreign minister, has told Al Jazeera the next few days are key in Russias invasion of Ukraine as President Vladimir Putins initial order was to complete the mil… [+2025 chars]
